defaultError: An error occurred. Please try again.
BadRequestError: Invalid data. Please check and try again.
UnauthorizedError: You are not authorized. Please log in to continue.
ConflictError: This email is already in use.
SomethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
UserNotFound: User not found. Please check the data.
WaterNotFound: Record not found. Please check the data.
deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the entry?
editWater: Edit the entered amount of water
disabledMessage: You cannot add water for a future date.
enterValue: Enter the value of the water used:
messagePart1: It looks like there's nothing here yet!
messagePart2: Tap 'Add Water' to log your water intake for this day.
futureMessagePart1: Oops! You can't log water intake for future dates.
fetchError: Error loading data. Please try again later.
massage: Do you really want to leave?
recordWater: Record daily water intake and track
checkEmail: Please check your email to reset your password.
longPwd: Password can't be longer than 64 characters
minName: Name must be at least 2 characters
maxName: Name can't be longer than 50 characters
maxWeight: Weight value must be less than or equal to 300
maxActiveTime: Active sports time value must be less than or equal to 12
name: Your name
waterFormula: V is the volume of the water norm in liters per day, M is your body weight, T is the time of active sports, or another type of activity commensurate in terms of loads (in the absence of these, you must set 0)
sportsTime: The time of active participation in sports:
waterNeeded: The required amount of water in liters per day:
waterHowMuch: Write down how much water you will drink:
welcomeText: This app helps you track your water intake and maintain a healthy balance. Let's explore how to use it! ðŸš€
welcomeMessage: Here you can see your name and welcome message.
dailyNorm: This section shows your daily water consumption norm.
todayProgress: This indicator shows how much water you have drunk today.
addWaterBtn: Click this button to add your water intake.
calendarSection: Here you can see your water consumption statistics for past days. Each day displays the percentage of the daily norm completed.
profileSettings: This is where your profile settings are located.
waterHistory: This section shows the history of water intake for today. You can see how many times and in what quantity water was added.
finalText: Now you know how to use AquaTrack. Don't forget to log your water intake regularly and monitor your norm.
finalMotivation: Let's start your journey to a healthy lifestyle!
